item.title: About
item.description: Hello, my name es Mauricio Tabares a.k.a matabares, mostly, my time is dedicated to computers and related stuff. Like a lot of developers around the world, my knowledge of computers comes from solving real-life problems instead of the academy. I’m an English language fan/student, and the idea behind this blog is to force myself to practice how to write in English. So feel free to put in contact with me if you find any error.
